title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 154 - Change Of Resident Status During Year
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 154 - Change Of Resident Status During Year

State Regulations

Returns (§ 154.1 to 154.4)

New York Taxable Income, New York Personal Service Taxable Income and New York State Minimum Taxable Income (§ 154.5 to 154.11)

Lump Sum Distributions (§ 154.12 to 154.13)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 20, ch. II, subch. A, art. 4, pt. 154

Statutory authority: Tax Law, §§171, 697

Except for section
154.6, this Part does not reflect amendments to the Tax Law made by the Tax Reform
and Reduction Act of 1987 (chapter 28 of the Laws of 1987) and certain other
amendments. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
